Title: Restoring the Faith
Description:
The shattered fragments have been reformed. We are ready to repair the Oathstone.

Go now and help Wrathion complete the repairs.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Wrathion at the Obsidian Throne
RewardText: This complicates matters, but I will not be denied what is rightfully mine!

Objectives.Text: Travel with Wrathion to the Throne
